package.name: uav_py
package.description: This package provides a set of Python-based utilities and modules for simulating and controlling UAVs within a ROS2 environment. It includes components for UAV vision processing, environment simulation, video streaming, and tracking using ArUco markers. This package is designed to work seamlessly with Gazebo for UAV simulation and is integrated with PX4 for UAV control. It is intended for research and development of autonomous aerial vehicles with a focus on real-time applications and computer vision techniques.
